text: Aayiram Roobai () is 1964 Tamil language film, directed and written by K. S. Gopalakrishnan and produced by Chinna Annamalai. It stars Gemini Ganesan, Savitri, Nagesh and M. R. Radha. ==Cast== * Gemini Ganesan * Savitri * Nagesh * M. R. Radha * S. A. Ashokan * S. V. Sahasranamam * Kottapuli Jayaraman * Master Babu * Ragini * Mohana * Nalini * Baby Savitri *A. Veerappan * Gemini Balu *Karikol Raju ==Soundtrack== Music was by K. V. Mahadevan and lyrics were written by Kannadasan, A. Maruthakasi and Vaali. Suseela || Kannadasan || 03:27 |} ==Release and reception== Aayiram Roobai was released on 3 December 1964. On 12 December 1964, The Indian Express stated, "A crude and twisted adaptation of the Million Pound Note, Aayiram Roopai contains precious little that is commendable. The Aayiram Roopai note in the film is counterfeit, so also the entertainment it doles out." ==References== ==External links== Category:1964 films Category:1960s Tamil-language films Category:Indian black- and-white films Category:Tamil film scores by K.
